oracle.pg.text.lucene

Class OracleDirectory

  • java.lang.Object
    • oracle.pg.text.lucene.OracleDirectory
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    RDBMSLuceneDirectory

    public class OracleDirectory
extends Object
    This class manages Lucene Directory objects.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static class  OracleDirectory.DirectoryType
      It denotes the type of directories for storing Lucene indexes.

      Constructs an OracleDirectory object.

    • Method Summary

      Creates an OracleDirectory object using FSDirectory for the specified number of sub-directories.

      Creates an OracleDirectory object using FSDirectory sub-directories.

      int size()
      Gets the number of sub-directories handled by this OracleDirectory.

      • OracleDirectory

        public OracleDirectory(String directoryName,
               OracleDirectory.DirectoryType directoryType,
               String[] locations,
               int numSubDirs)
                throws OracleIndexException
        Constructs an OracleDirectory object.
        Parameters:
        directoryName - the name of this directory.
        directoryType - the type of Directories to use (FS, MMap, JDBC)
        locations - the location(s) where the sub-directories will be created.
        numSubDirs - the number of sub-directories to use in this Directory.
        Throws:
        OracleIndexException
